attributes.action: Demand an urgent Government response to the newly impending energy crisis.
attributes.additional_details: Being once again at the mercy of the open energy market will plunge millions of working families into hardship and debt.  This will adversely affect the wider economy.
attributes.background: Act urgently to reassure millions of working families that they will have price protection in the continually soaring energy market.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the energy market, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Subsidise a 'basic' amount of electricity for households: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616915

Reform energy pricing and taxes to better protect lower income households: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621407

Establish a not-for-profit state owned energy provider: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617446

Introduce a "Triple lock" to restrict energy cap increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621347
